inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: SOOS API Key

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.label: Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: SOOS Client Id

inputs.name: scanType
inputs.label: Scan Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of scan you would like to run.

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the project. Defaults to 'Build.Repository.Name'.

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the branch. Defaults to 'System.PullRequest.SourceBranch' when available, otherwise 'Build.SourceBranchName'.

inputs.name: branchUri
inputs.label: Branch URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The link to the current branch. Defaults to 'Build.Repository.Uri'.

inputs.name: commitHash
inputs.label: Commit Hash
inputs.helpMarkDown: The commit hash associated with the code being analyzed. Defaults to 'Build.SourceVersion'.

inputs.name: buildVersion
inputs.label: Build Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The current build version.

inputs.name: buildUri
inputs.label: Build URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The link to the current build. Defaults to 'Build.BuildUri'.

inputs.name: projectPath
inputs.label: Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The relative path to the project root. Defaults to 'Build.SourcesDirectory'.

inputs.name: excludedDirectories
inputs.label: Excluded Directories
inputs.helpMarkDown: A list of directories, delimited by comma, to exclude when searching for manifest files.

inputs.name: waitForScan
inputs.label: Wait for the scan to finish
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to wait for the scan to finish.

inputs.name: outputFormat
inputs.label: Output Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: After the scan finishes, log the output to the console.

inputs.name: targetUri
inputs.label: Target Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the URL of the application you wish to attack, starting with 'http://' or 'https://'.

inputs.name: apiFormat
inputs.label: Api Format
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target API format: openapi, soap, or graphql.

inputs.name: useAjaxSpider
inputs.label: Use Ajax Spider
inputs.helpMarkDown: When true the scan will use the ajax spider which is slower than the traditional spider but is better at handling applications that make heavy use of Javascript.

inputs.name: scanDurationInMinutes
inputs.label: Scan Duration In Minutes
inputs.helpMarkDown: The duration of time in minutes for the spider to run before reporting the results.

inputs.name: contextFile
inputs.label: Context File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the context file which will be loaded prior to scanning the target.

inputs.name: contextUser
inputs.label: Context User
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to use for authenticated scans. Must be defined in the context file.

inputs.name: reportingRulesFilePath
inputs.label: Reporting Rules
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the reporting rules file used with reporting level.

inputs.name: dockerImageTag
inputs.label: Docker Image Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tag of the DAST docker image you wish to run.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Enable verbose logging
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to enable verbose logging.

inputs.name: baseUri
inputs.label: API Base URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SOOS API Base URI.
